document.full_text: europe should help frontline italy and malta cope with people fleeing unrest in north africa, but the maghreb region itself has borne the brunt of libya's crisis, aid agencies said on tuesday.
document.title: north africa, not europe, shoulders libya crisis: agencies
lines_and_colors: europe should help frontline italy and malta cope with people fleeing unrest in north africa, but the maghreb region itself has borne the brunt of libya's crisis, aid agencies said on tuesday.
